content.name: Realtime Stamp + Turn Timer Invariant v1
content.goal: Reinstate turniodic real-time checks/stamps and enforce turn-level timing receipts without claiming inaccessible wall-clock facts.
problem_statement: Missing periodic real-time stamps and inability to compute elapsed real-world time reliably.
Inconsistent python artifact materialization for deltas/tools.
invariants_added: Every assistant response includes a TIMESTAMP block with UTC and America/Chicago local time.
If prior stamp exists in-session, compute elapsed time since last stamp; otherwise state elapsed unknown (no prior stamp).
Never claim total wall-clock chat duration unless stamps exist covering the interval.

periodic_checks.real_time_source: user_info tool when available; else system UTC + configured timezone for local display

python_artifact_policy.rule: Any delta/tool introduced must be written to /mnt/data and linked in same turn.
